info.name: Mastodon Cyberpunk Neon
info.description: WARNING: Userstyles no longer supported. Please install via GreasyFork Cyberpunk Neon color scheme is a cyberpunk/outrun color scheme based on the Cyberpunk Neon Color Palette. Want more of it? Check out https://github.com/Roboron3042/Cyberpunk-Neon If you like my work you can buy me a ko-fi or support me on liberapay.
